Package org.easybatch.integration.hibernate

This package contains Hibernate support classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HibernateMultiRecordReader<T>
    Reads records in chunks using Hibernate.
    HibernateRecordReader<T>
    Reader that reads data using Hibernate API.
    HibernateRecordWriter<T>
    Writes entities to a database using Hibernate.
    HibernateTransactionJobListener
    Listener that commits a transaction at the end of the job.
    HibernateTransactionStepListener
    Listener that commits a Hibernate transaction after inserting a predefined number of records (commit-interval).

Package org.easybatch.integration.hibernate Description

This package contains Hibernate support classes.
